Class Subscription<CONTENT>

  • Type Parameters:
    CONTENT - The type of content.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade, NonBlockingBlade, Closeable

    public abstract class Subscription<CONTENT>
extends NonBlockingBladeBase
implements Closeable
    A subscription allows a subscriber to receive content of interest from a RequestBus.
